entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:51 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 89 %

Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
